text: are there any updates about adding stylesheets to the head of drag and drop email? inserting styles in the body seems very odd. responsive design is requiered for emails, but normaly you cant place media queries as inline styles; expect the html source element. will be someday the data-hse-inline-css="true" preprocessor supported? which will be a good step forwad, but to add stylesheets to the head seems still be necessary.
Hey all, what's the latest on adding partials/Hubl templates and the drag and drop interface?
